Enjoy your movie time!

If you're looking for a docudrama like "We Are Marshall," I'd recommend "Tombstone" starring Kurt Russell and Val Kilmer, which tells the story of the legendary lawmen who founded Tombstone, Arizona, and their battles against outlaws in the Wild West.

Alternatively, if you're open to a mystery-thriller with international intrigue, "Smilla's Sense of Snow" starring Julia Ormond is an intriguing film about a woman who investigates the death of a young Inuit boy living in Copenhagen. Both films are engaging and offer compelling narratives. Enjoy your movie time!
